name: Out Of Control (Sebastian Caron)
description:
Greetings Commander ! 

There is a problem with the space station.
There is no more electricity and the reactor becomes unstable. 

We need you! Collect the blue balls on the ground to keep the reactor stable.

(The blue balls appear randomly on the ground every 2 seconds )

Use your fire extinguisher to get around. Move slowly but surely.                  

Remember to keep an eye on the reactor stability bar.
Survive 300 seconds so that we can resolve this problem.

Thank you Commander, Good luck!

(Don't forget to give your opinion in comments)
